def_cn: (遭受诸如地震、洪水等侵袭而受灾严重的)灾区
def_en: A disaster area is a part of a country or the world which has been very seriously affected by a disaster such as an earthquake or a flood.

def_cn: 极度混乱的地方;多灾多难的人;一团糟的状态
def_en: If you describe a place, person, or situation as a disaster area, you mean that they are in a state of great disorder or failure.
